attributes.background:
Shamed MP for Burton & Uttoxeter has become an Independent MP following a disciplinary by the Conservative Party Disciplinary Committee at the end of October 2018.

7500 or more signatures are needed to demand a by-election (10% of the electorate).

We need our local media to highlight this.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs to be sacked or fired. 

The resignation of an MP would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
